players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am shocked by Diana's death so early. We need to be careful and watch who acts suspiciously today."
Bob: "I have information that can help us. Charlie is the mafioso. We need to act quickly to vote him out before he kills again."
Bob: "I urge everyone to vote for Charlie now. We cannot afford to hesitate; he is the mafia and the biggest threat to our town's survival."
Charlie: "I find Bob's accusations very sudden and unsubstantiated. Why would I reveal myself so early? We should focus on finding real clues, not rushing to vote based on fear."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
